item.title: TheProgrammingTuts
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=`Alec link=topic=457303.msg3354941#msg3354941 date=1285717403]

First you buy scu11’s 474 now you make programming tuts?

I fail to see what you are trying to say?

He has money, he can spend it how he wants…
[/quote]
Are you also agreeing with the fact that he buys all his servers, then releases them with most, if not all, credits to himself?[/quote]The 474 is the only server I’ve bought so IDK what kinda crack ur on? And anywho I’ve done enough work in there to be a contributer…

Read full topic

item.title: TheProgrammingTuts
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Think of it.

It is his, but even if he bought it he obviously did not write the code for it. He cannot say that he did. That’s like buying an item from a store and saying you invented it because you own it.

Read full topic

item.title: TheProgrammingTuts
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:9, topic:361015”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=457303.msg3355014#msg3355014 date=1285724806]

First you buy scu11’s 474 now you make programming tuts?

I fail to see what you are trying to say?

He has money, he can spend it how he wants…

Are you also agreeing with the fact that he buys all his servers, then releases them with most, if not all, credits to himself?

We may not approve of it, but if he buys the rights to a server he can give himself all the credit.
[/quote]

False. He can say it belongs to him, but he cannot say he created it.[/quote]if your talking “legally” your crrrazzzyyyy. and yeah he can say he created it, its just everyone doesnt believe him

Read full topic
